mapper.update: update user set isDeleted='Y' , deletedDateTime = NOW() where userID=#{userID};
mapper.select: SELECT userNo , userID , userName , type , profileImageURL , birthday , facebookID , facebookURL , kakaoID , jobTitle , sex , appVersion , regID from user where userID=#{value}

SELECT userNo , userID , userName , type , profileImageURL , birthday , facebookID , facebookURL , kakaoID , jobTitle , sex from user where userID in ( SELECT friend_one from friends where friend_two=#{value} and status = 1 union SELECT friend_two from friends where friend_one=#{value} and status = 1 ) and isDeleted is null limit 0, 3;

SELECT userNo , userID , userName , type , profileImageURL , birthday , facebookID , facebookURL , kakaoID , jobTitle , sex from user where userID in ( SELECT friend_one from friends where friend_two=#{value} and status = 1 union SELECT friend_two from friends where friend_one=#{value} and status = 1 ) and isDeleted is null limit 0, 50;
select ut.seed, ut.hash, ut.expireDate, ut.activeYN, u.* from user_token ut left outer join user u on ut.userID = u.userID where ut.hash = #{value} and u.isDeleted is null
mapper.insert: insert into user_token( userID, seed, hash, expireDate, activeYN, createdDate ) values ( #{userID}, #{seed}, #{hash}, NOW() + INTERVAL 20 DAY, 'Y', NOW() );
